tweet_text: @shwinnypooh This is a great q, imo it depends on the rest of the roster. In a vacuum I picked Trae because he's an elite playmaker. On a team with a primary creator already, like Lebron or Harden or Doncic etc., Mitchell and Kyrie would be my choice, in a role similar to Kyrie on the Cavs.
